Package spaceinvaders.command.client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeScoreCommand
    Change the score of a player.
    ClientCommandBuilder
    Builds commands wich are going to be executed on the client side.
    FlushScreenCommand
    Flush the screen.
    GameOverCommand
    The player dies.
    MoveEntityCommand
    Move an entity to a new position.
    PlayersLostCommand
    Humans lost the game.
    PlayersWonCommand
    Humans won the game.
    QuitGameCommand
    Quit game.
    RefreshEntitiesCommand
    Refresh entities that appear on the screen.
    SetPlayerIdCommand
    Set the id of the player, which is generated by the server.
    SetPlayerNamesCommand
    Associate players ids with names.
    SpawnEntityCommand
    Create a new entity.
    StartGameCommand
    Start the game.
    TranslateGroupCommand
    Move a all entities belonging to a groupe, relative to their current position.
    WipeOutEntityCommand
    Wipe out a destroyed entity from the screen.
